title: Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils, Pre-Sharpened, 2 HB Soft, Yellow, 30 Count
descriptions:
Introducing the Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils, Pre-Sharpened, 2 HB Soft, Yellow, 30 Count! 

Experience the smooth performance of our exclusive #2 graphite formula, paired with a thick core for consistent lines. Our premium wood is responsibly sourced, and the pencils are finished with a golden yellow lacquer in a matte coating. Each pencil comes pre-sharpened for your convenience and is equipped with a latex-free, smudge-free eraser in our signature green & gold ferrule. 

Rest assured, our pencils are PMA certified non-toxic, making them a safe choice for all users. With over 100 years of tradition, Ticonderoga pencils are the preferred choice for teachers and artists alike. Elevate your writing and drawing experience with the Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils!

Introducing the Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils, Pre-Sharpened, 2 HB Soft, Yellow, 30 Count - the ultimate writing tool for any task! Made with exclusive #2 graphite for smooth performance and a thick core for consistent lines, these pencils are a must-have for students, artists, and professionals alike. The premium wood is responsibly sourced from managed forests, and the golden yellow lacquered finish gives them a classic and elegant look. Plus, with latex-free erasers that remove marks completely without smudging, and PMA certified non-toxic safety, you can trust in the quality and reliability of Ticonderoga. With over 100 years of tradition and the preference of teachers, you can't go wrong with Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils. Get your 30-count pack today and experience the difference!

Introducing the Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils, Pre-Sharpened, 2 HB Soft, Yellow, 30 Count! 

Crafted with exclusive #2 graphite for smooth performance and a thick core for consistent lines, these pencils are a must-have for any writing or drawing task. The premium wood used is responsibly sourced and the pencils are finished with a golden yellow lacquer for a sleek, matte look. Plus, they come pre-sharpened for immediate use.

But that's not all - the latex-free eraser removes marks completely without smudging, and the pencils are PMA certified non-toxic for peace of mind. With over 100 years of tradition, Ticonderoga is the preferred choice of teachers everywhere.

Don't miss out on this high-quality product from a trusted brand! Get your 30-count pack of Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils today.
